readable.title: 353180303_6a24179c50
readable.content: A costumes woman applies makeup while looking in a mirror . A showgirl , holding lipstick in her hand , and wearing a feather headdress , looks in a mirror . A showgirl puts on her lipstick in the mirror . A woman in a fancy costume is fixer her makeup in front of a mirror . Costumed woman applying lipstick .
